channel.title: Short Form on Walter Manger
channel.description: Recent content in Short Form on Walter Manger

item.title: 2022 In Review
item.description: It 2022, I: Took a new position I’m working in an industry that I have not been exposed to (Ad Tech), using a language that I haven’t written for a while (Golang), embracing some techniques and technologies I have not used in a professional context (Bazel, Tilt, Monorepo). Traveled At the end of the school year, we got to visit Yellowstone just before it got flooded out. Before that, we spent a short time back in Tampa Bay.
